snippet: Some owners and designers are doing different and interesting work, highlighting Williamsburg’s industrial past while adding modern elements.
abstract: The Appraisal column; some residential design and development projects in Williamsburg section of Brooklyn, are taking risks, highlighting area’s industrial past while adding modern elements; some of the creative design is driven by neighborhood’s transformation from unconventional to fashionable, attracting wealthy, artistic types who want private homes that are both luxurious and high-design.
lead_paragraph: Some owners and designers are doing different and interesting work, highlighting Williamsburg’s industrial past while adding modern elements.

headline.main: Standing Out Amid Monotony in Residential Design
headline.print_headline: Standing Out Amid Monotony in Residential Design
